Question: AIMA E-Bike, Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AIMA E-Bike, Inc

Product: emoped-HYHAWK

- Cyber-digital style with futuristic look
- Tailored for new riders, ensuring safety and easy handling
- Winner of the U.S. MUSE Design Gold Award
- Exceptional performance with powerful drive system and thermal tires
- Innovative design for an enjoyable riding experience

Product: Santa Monica eBike

- Inspired by Route 66 in Santa Monica
- Equipped with a powerful yet lightweight 750W city bike motor
- High-performance suspension fork and Hydraulic Disc Brake
- Aimed at offering a liberating urban cruise
- Enriching the electric riding lifestyle and trendy concepts
Summary_cn:
艾玛电动车有限公司

产品：emoped-HYHAWK

- 前卫的网络数字风格外观
- 专为新手骑手量身定制，确保安全和易驾驶性
- 赢得了美国MUSE设计金奖
- 强大的驱动系统和高性能轮胎，卓越的性能
- 创新设计，让骑行体验更加愉悦

产品：圣莫妮卡电动自行车

- 灵感来自圣莫尼卡的66号公路
- 配备强大但轻便的750W城市电动车电机
- 高性能避震前叉和液压碟刹
- 旨在提供自由的城市巡航
- 丰富电动骑行生活方式和时尚概念
